Summary: super long with two sets of wings, bright light in nose, little sound flew slow
divs: sighting detailshi, i have checked several sites of aircraft and would like to know what i saw one day, around the 17th of dec. 2006. i hate to bother you, but can't get this out of my mind. it was a few days after they quit looking for those mountain climbers in oregon, around 5:30 p.m. outside of niles, michigan. i had just finished chores and was going to ride my atv up to the mail box. as i looked to the west i saw a bright light, i thought oh, venus... then i noticed i didn't see anything else , as there was cloud cover. i rode up to the mail box, about 1\2 mile away. on the way back i thought the light was closer, so i watched it and after putting the atv away, i stood and watched some more. time had elapsed around 5 or so minutes. as it drew closer, i saw it had an extremely rounded body. i thought, wow if there were a pilot and a co pilot, they would have to sit one behind the other. it was cigar shaped, super long with two tiny wings they went straight out they were about 1\4 the length of the plane, looked very unstable to me. i think the plane was over 100 feet long, but couldn't tell for sure. anyway behind these two tiny wings were some square shaped wings, that looked like the corners had been cut off. then a regular tail. the ones with the upright tail part in the middle, none of the wings or tail were swept back. i saw no cockpit, nor windows. i heard a little noise, but couldn't tell if it was a prop or jet. the one thing that made me keep looking at it was the extremely bright nose light. i had thought it to be a planet at first it was so bright. as the object went right over my head i saw it had a little light on each wing, but no red or green blinking lights anywhere to be seen. the color looked like an army green\gray color. was this a plane that had high tech equipment in it looking for the mountain climbers? it was traveling west to east, like it was coming from chicago and going to detroit. i have looked at over 700 photos of aircraft on the internet but as close as i can find is the u2 spy plane, but it didn't have the extra set of wings. they also don't have the bright light in the nose either. thanks for any help you can get. i did draw a picture of it, so i wouldn't forget what it looked like, by looking at all the photos on the internet. carolyn terr
